Butler
A Handmade Extension for Cliq
Home
Gen Bot Course Bot Resume Bot
1
Menu

Say Hi to see the resume-bot menu.

2
Creating Resume

Press the Create Resume button and enter an unique name to create a new resume file.

3
Editing Resume

After creating your resume file,you can enter or edit it's contents by clicking the Edit Resume button. Select the resume you want to edit. Then select the section you want to edit.Then fill each section's contents accordingly.

4
Viewing Resume

To view your resume you should have filled atleast your basic details,then click on the View Resume button and select the resume and theme you want to view your resume with.Then you will be provided with a link to view your resume.
Themes are various designs you can use to view your resume with. To see all the availabe themes enter themes in the resume-bot.

5
Deleting Resume

You can delete an resume file by clicking the Delete Resume button and selecting the resume you want to delete.
